bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when place a fragile objects, the elastic objects must be in the bin
rules.4: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
